description: Kookmin University is a prestigious private university located in Seoul, South Korea. Founded in 1946, it is recognized for its strong programs in engineering, design, and information technology, situated in the scenic Bukhansan area of northern Seoul.
transportation: Located in the Seongbuk-gu district of Seoul, easily accessible via Seoul Metro Line 4 (Gireum Station) and various bus routes. Incheon International Airport is approximately 90 minutes away by airport limousine bus or AREX express train.
